1.brief: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
to scan, i.e. look intently at; by implication, to regard with pleasure, favor or care
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)

2.brief: properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
to turn about or over; by implication, to change, overturn, return, pervert
to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be aforeigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
strange, in a variety of degrees and applications (foreign, non-relative, adulterous, different, wonderful)

3.brief: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application
a mother (as the bond of the family); in a wide sense (both literally and figuratively (like father))
a widow; also a desolate place

4.brief: water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen
silver (from its pale color); by implication, money
a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)

5.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the back of the neck (as that on which burdens are bound)
to run after (usually with hostile intent; figuratively (of time) gone by)
properly, to gasp; hence, to be exhausted, to tire, to toil
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to rest, i.e. settle down; used in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, intransitive, transitive and causative (to dwell, stay, let fall, place, let alone, withdraw, give comfort, etc.)

6.brief: Mitsrajim, i.e. Upper and Lower Egypt
to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
Ashshur, the second son of Shem; also his descendants and the country occupied by them (i.e. Assyria), its region and its empire
to sate, i.e. fill to satisfaction (literally or figuratively)
food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it)

7.brief: father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application
properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
to carry (literally or figuratively), or (reflexively) be burdensome; specifically, to be gravid

8.brief: to break off or crunch; figuratively, to deliver
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),

9.brief: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it)
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
drought; also a cutting instrument (from its destructive effect), as a knife, sword, or other sharp implement
a pasture (i.e. open field, whither cattle are driven); by implication, a desert; also speech (including its organs)

10.brief: skin (as naked); by implication, hide, leather
properly, to intertwine or contract, i.e. (by implication) to shrivel (as with heat); figuratively, to be deeply affected with passion (love or pity)
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
a glow (of wind or anger); also a famine (as consuming)

11.brief: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
to depress literally or figuratively, transitive or intransitive (in various applications, as follows)
a virgin (from her privacy); sometimes (by continuation) a bride; also (figuratively) a city or state
a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)
Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory

12.brief: a head person (of any rank or class)
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to swell up (literally or figuratively, active or passive); by implication, to favor or honour, be high or proud

13.brief: properly, selected, i.e. a youth (often collective)
a hand mill; hence, a millstone
to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
(concretely) a boy (as active), from the age of infancy to adolescence; by implication, a servant; also (by interch. of sex), a girl (of similar latitude in age)
a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)
to totter or waver (through weakness of the legs, especially the ankle); by implication, to falter, stumble, faint or fall

14.brief: an opening, i.e. door or gate
to repose, i.e. desist from exertion; used in many implied relations (causative, figurative or specific)
properly, selected, i.e. a youth (often collective)
properly, instrumental music; by implication, a stringed instrument; by extension, a poem set to music; specifically, an epigram

15.brief: to repose, i.e. desist from exertion; used in many implied relations (causative, figurative or specific)
delight, concretely (the cause or object) or abstractly (the feeling)
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
to turn about or over; by implication, to change, overturn, return, pervert

16.brief: to fall, in a great variety of applications (intransitive or causative, literal or figurative)
the head (as most easily shaken), whether literal or figurative (in many applications, of place, time, rank, itc.)
'I pray', 'now', or 'then'; added mostly to verbs (in the Imperative or Future), or to interjections, occasionally to an adverb or conjunction
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn

17.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that
to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
to be dark (as withholding light); transitively, to darken
an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)

18.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
to stun (or intransitively, grow numb), i.e. devastate or (figuratively) stupefy (both usually in a passive sense)
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)

19.brief: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry
properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
properly, a revolution of time, i.e. an age or generation; also a dwelling
properly, a revolution of time, i.e. an age or generation; also a dwelling

20.brief: properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses

properly, a goal, i.e. the bright object at adistance travelled towards; hence (figuratively), splendor, or (subjectively) truthfulness, or (objectively) confidence; but usually (adverbially), continually (i.e. to the most distant point of view)
to mislay, i.e. to be oblivious of, from want of memory or attention
to loosen, i.e. relinquish, permit, etc.
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)

21.brief: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
near, with or among; often in general, to
to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
to be new; causatively, to rebuild
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
the front, of place (absolutely, the fore part, relatively the East) or time (antiquity); often used adverbially (before, anciently, eastward)

22.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to crack off, i.e. (figuratively) burst out in rage
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)
